content:
I'd be happy to help you update your doll collection inventory list. Organizing your list by category can make it easier to manage and add new items. Here's a suggested template to get you started:

**Doll Collection Inventory Template**

**Category 1: Doll Type**

| Doll Type | Manufacturer | Model/Name | Year Released | Condition | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| (e.g. Barbie) | (e.g. Mattel) | (e.g. Malibu Barbie) | (e.g. 1971) | (e.g. Mint in Box) | (e.g. rare variant) |

**Category 2: Era**

| Era | Doll Type | Manufacturer | Model/Name | Year Released | Condition | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| (e.g. Vintage) | (e.g. Porcelain) | (e.g. German) | (e.g. Antique Doll) | (e.g. 1850s) | (e.g. Restored) | (e.g. rare find) |

**Category 3: Size**

| Size | Doll Type | Manufacturer | Model/Name | Year Released | Condition | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| (e.g. 18") | (e.g. Fashion Doll) | (e.g. Tonner) | (e.g. Tyler Wentworth) | (e.g. 2005) | (e.g. Near Mint) | (e.g. limited edition) |

**Category 4: Material**

| Material | Doll Type | Manufacturer | Model/Name | Year Released | Condition | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| (e.g. Vinyl) | (e.g. Action Figure) | (e.g. Hasbro) | (e.g. G.I. Joe) | (e.g. 1964) | (e.g. Good) | (e.g. rare accessory) |

**Category 5: Brand**

| Brand | Doll Type | Manufacturer | Model/Name | Year Released | Condition | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| (e.g. American Girl) | (e.g. Historical Character) | (e.g. Pleasant Company) | (e.g. Felicity) | (e.g. 1991) | (e.g. Excellent) | (e.g. complete set) |

You can add or remove categories as needed to fit your specific collection. You can also add or remove columns within each category to suit your needs.

Here's a brief explanation of each category:

* **Doll Type**: Categorize dolls by type, such as fashion dolls, porcelain dolls, antique dolls, etc.
* **Era**: Organize dolls by era, such as vintage, antique, modern, etc.
* **Size**: Categorize dolls by size, such as 18", 12", 6", etc.
* **Material**: Organize dolls by material, such as vinyl, porcelain, resin, etc.
* **Brand**: Categorize dolls by brand, such as Barbie, American Girl, Tonner, etc.

To add new items, simply fill in the relevant information in the corresponding category. You can also use this template to track additional information, such as:

* Where you purchased the doll
* The original price you paid
* Any restoration or repairs done
* Any special features or accessories
* The doll's current value

Remember to update your list regularly as your collection grows!
